hero.subtitle: Partner with Social Income and demonstrate social responsibility through meaningful, lasting impact in the fight against extreme poverty.

usp.reason-description-1: Your donation directly funds innovative, and empowering direct-cash programs for people in extreme poverty. Direct cash transfers are evidence-based, effective poverty relief for the most vulnerable.
usp.reason-description-2: Clearly demonstrate to your employees, partners, and clients your genuine commitment to social impact, directly supporting systemic change against poverty and global inequality.
usp.reason-description-3: Start with a simple donation or seamlessly transition into launching your organization's own direct cash program, customized to your mission, values, and the cause you care about.
usp.reason-description-4: Social Income is a fully volunteer-driven open source initiative, which keeps our administrative costs exceptionally low. This means donations become monthly payments sent straight to recipients’ phones.
usp.section-title-3: Ways Your Organization Can Make a Difference
usp.section-3-option-2b: Donate your employees’ time to develop Social Income further.
usp.section-3-option-3b: “Adopt a Community” by sponsoring your own tailored cash-transfer program.

partner-carousel.title: Our partners against poverty
partner-carousel.subtitle: Each partnership took its own shape, yet all were driven by the same purpose: fighting poverty where it hits hardest. Some gave funds, others their know-how, and others the tools behind our open-source platform.

partnership-models.title: Ways you and your organization can make a difference
partnership-models.card-2-description: Help grow Social Income through in-kind support such as employee time or free access to your software.
partnership-models.card-2-dialog-text: We receive in-kind donations from Google, GitHub, Codemagic, Linktree, Twilio, Algolia, JetBrains, Storyblok, 1Password, Mux, Sentry and Lineto.
partnership-models.card-3-description: Select a cause and fund a cash-transfer program that supports a whole community.
partnership-models.card-3-dialog-text: This option will be launched in 2026.
partnership-models.card-4-description: Become a Bronze, Silver, or Gold Partner to help scale Social Income.
partnership-models.card-4-dialog-row-1c: More than 60 cash transfers to people in poverty, reaching on average 360 people.
partnership-models.card-4-dialog-row-1d: Logo on our website, Social media shout out, Quarterly updates, art poster “Scene from Africa”, and brown bag lunch by Social Income team for your employees.
partnership-models.card-4-dialog-row-2c: More than 300 cash transfers to people in poverty, reaching on average 1800 people.
partnership-models.card-4-dialog-row-2d: All Bronze benefits, plus “Adopt a community:” tailored program in the community you care most about, sets of artistic postcards “Scenes from Africa” for your employees.
partnership-models.card-4-dialog-row-3c: More than 1000 cash transfers to people in poverty, reaching on average 6000 people.
partnership-models.card-4-dialog-row-3d: All Silver benefits plus feature story in annual report, personalized field visit to country with active programs.
